duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and promote a safety-first culture by engaging with staff and business partners to ensure safety in all activities.
Provide health and safety support for day-to-day operations and project planning.
Perform risk assessments, develop, review, and improve Site-Specific Health and Safety Plans.
Support tracking and reporting of health, safety, and environmental client-specific safety metrics.
Deliver health & safety trainings, implement subcontractor health and safety prequalification program, and manage safety reporting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Health, Safety, or Environmental related discipline
